attributes.action: For Kirklees Social Services to React in 21 days.
attributes.additional_details:
On April 11th 2012, Maria Blackburn was found dead at her home by social services who had come to check on her. Her ill health was reported to them on March 18th, yet Kirklees Social Services took 24 days to respond.

The current system allows Kirklees Social Services 28 days to act. THIS IS NOT FAST ENOUGH!

Please sign this petition to decrease the time allowed for action to be taken from 28 days to 21 days, so that this may never happen again.

Thank you.
